message.content:
cs.CR, cs.DS, cs.SE, cs.DB, cs.PL

The paper discusses a formal access control model using relationships and a two-stage request evaluation process. This topic falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR) as it deals with access control. The paper also mentions the use of non-deterministic finite automata, which is a topic in computer science theory (cs.DS). The inclusion of contextual information and support for policy foundations suggests that the paper may also be relevant to software engineering (cs.SE), database systems (cs.DB), and programming languages (cs.PL).
